permissions: Admin users can update tractor credentials. Non-admin users can update a tractor credential only if they are a manager of the tractor's trucker or broker and the credential classification is within their policy scope.
side_effects: Updates issued_on and/or expires_on on a tractor credential record.
validation_notes: Requires the <id> argument. At least one of --issued-on or --expires-on must be provided. Date fields expect YYYY-MM-DD. If both issued_on and expires_on are set, expires_on must be >= issued_on. Credential periods cannot overlap an existing credential for the same tractor and classification.
